= Tower of Hanoi Recursive Agent 2 =
This agent solves the problem using an MEA Recursive Strategy. The general description of the task from the [Agent_ToH_Simple Simple Tower of Hanoi Agent] still applies.
  
=== Soar capabilities ===
  * Recursive problem solving
